amendment.description: Amendment sought to repeal the 2001 AUMF after 90 days of enactment of this Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 114-571 to repeal the 2001 AUMF after 90 days of enactment of this Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lee amendment (A022) Failed by recorded vote: 138 - 285 (Roll no. 210).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
